java/liquibase/database/sql/DropTableStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class DropTableStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String tableName;
00010     private boolean cascadeConstraints;
00011 
00012     public DropTableStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, boolean cascadeConstraints) {
00013         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00014         this.tableName = tableName;
00015         this.cascadeConstraints = cascadeConstraints;
00016     }
00017 
00018     public String getSchemaName() {
00019         return schemaName;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getTableName() {
00023         return tableName;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public boolean isCascadeConstraints() {
00027         return cascadeConstraints;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00031         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00032         buffer.append("DROP TABLE ").append(database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()));
00033         if (isCascadeConstraints()) {
00034             if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00035                     || database instanceof DB2Database
00036                     || database instanceof MSSQLDatabase
00037                     || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00038                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support drop with cascade", this, database);
00039             }
00040             if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00041                 buffer.append(" CASCADE CONSTRAINTS");
00042             } else {
00043                 buffer.append(" CASCADE");
00044             }
00045         }
00046 
00047         return buffer.toString();
00048 
00049     }
00050 
00051     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00052         return ";";
00053     }
00054 
00055     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00056         return true;
00057     }
00058 }
